trans-unit.source: No ElasticEntity attribute found for class: {className}
trans-unit.target: No ElasticEntity attribute found for class: {className}

trans-unit.source: The entity of class {className} does not have a valid ID and cannot be mapped.
trans-unit.target: The entity of class {className} does not have a valid ID and cannot be mapped.

trans-unit.source: Entity {className} must have a getId method that returns a non-null value. Ensure the "id" property is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Entity {className} must have a getId method that returns a non-null value. Ensure the "id" property is initialized.

trans-unit.source: Invalid nested data format in Entity {className} for relation with {relatedClassName}.
trans-unit.target: Invalid nested data format in Entity {className} for relation with {relatedClassName}.

trans-unit.source: Nested data must be an associative array with string keys in Entity {className} for relation with {relatedClassName}.
trans-unit.target: Nested data must be an associative array with string keys in Entity {className} for relation with {relatedClassName}.

trans-unit.source: Index must be provided when no className is provided.
trans-unit.target: Index must be provided when no className is provided.

trans-unit.source: Unexpected response format from Elasticsearch count query.
